name: Timothy and the Tower of Mu
storyline:
Timothy's grandfather is dead... But legends tell of a tower so high that disappears above the clouds, built by a god. If someone manages to climb it to the top, a wish is granted. Timothy, armed with hope and courage, decides to face this deadly test and bring back to life his grandfather.
The Tower of Mu is waiting for the next victim: are you enough nimble, strong and smart to overcome this challenge?
summary: Ascend the tower to save your grandfather in this classic, hardcore action-platformer. The Tower of Mu is waiting for you... Push past each check point to the next awaiting challenge; dashing, jumping, and slinging your way up to the towers peak. Die. learn. Overcome.
